name: Agent Cat (Racso3)
description:
An 2D shooting game that's based on a cat's imagination while his owner leaves her alone at home.

How To Play:
  • WASD to walk
  • Hold Left Click to shoot
  • Hold Shift grant you extra speed
  • P to pause the game
Game Items:

  - Gun Upgrader and Ammo

 - Health pack (Only can be used when health is below 3 hearts)

 - Rocket (make sure you dont get hit by this)

- Spikes 

Story:

The original idea was about a cat which his owner left her. The cat started feeling unconfortable about everything surround her. The tables, the chairs, the fridge, the sofa, everything looked dangerous. Therefore, the cat turned into an agent to protect herself from 'dangers'. However, those actions of 'self-protecting' were just breaking, scratching on everything. 

SPOILERS!!!!

Some hours later, her owner came back and saw everything in his home was broken. But he did not care at all. All he cares was his lovely little cat. He grabbed his cat, place her on his thigh, sitting on the sofa of scratch, turned on the TV and started watching.

Cat felt so warm and safe again.

(Due to jam time limit I cant finish it dang)
